title: Silver that Forgets Promises
quest_giver: Lantern-Queen Thia Mol (warning of ghost-barge call)
description: The river falls like a held breath, and the Mistmarket Flats tremble into being. Aerin drifts among awnings and bells, past stalls selling feather-bright oils and eel-skin ledgers, following a ghost-barge whisper Thia passed along. High Bargewarden Ulo Hen plays host with a smile stapled over sharpened accounts. He would buy silence, sell a city’s patience by the dram, and dredge up an old debt owed to the ghost-barges to chain Aerin’s hands. The ghost-barge slides through fog, its crew silent as cut kelp, and offers a silver coin that takes a promise in exchange for forgetting another. Iven Rill, a cousin and river pilot with calloused hands, swears he’s seen eel-skin coin pass to a Rafter foreman named Danka Suth. Between Ulo’s leverage and the ghost-barge’s cold bargain, Aerin chooses the hard path: return stolen silver to the ghost-barge to quiet the dead debt, and pry from the Mistmarket a ledger bound in eel-skin that murmurs when warmed—the kind that forgets, unless lit by moonshard truth.
objectives: Meet Ulo Hen at the Riverfoot stall and deflect his attempt to bind you by debt.
Seek the ghost-barge before dawn bells and offer back the stolen silver on someone else’s behalf.
Secure the eel-skin ledger that records payments to Danka Suth and an initial to ‘R. Mestri’.
Enlist Iven Rill’s testimony about a hidden sluice trick at the Locks used to beach rival barges.

dialogue.speaker: Ulo Hen
dialogue.line: Paladin! Come, drink where the river pays the cup. I hear you’ve a taste for debts that wash clean in fog. Perhaps we can clean one of yours. Names needn’t be spoken for a city to keep balance. Let the market breathe; we’ll keep it from hyperventilating.

dialogue.speaker: Aerin Rell
dialogue.line: I’ve no thirst for your kindness, Bargewarden. Keep your fingers off my oaths. I’m here for a ledger that hums when warmed and the truth it’s tried to swallow.

dialogue.speaker: Iven Rill
dialogue.line: Saw it with my own eyes, Aerin. Eel-skin purse to Danka, hush-hush talk by the depth-mark poles, and a slide of water from a hidden sluice to beach a rival just in time to buy their cargo cheap. I’ll say it under oath if I must.

dialogue.speaker: Ghost-Barge Ferryman
dialogue.line: Silver returns to silver. A promise returns to the mouth that cast it. Take this coin back and remember what you are willing to forget to save a child. Pay it forward, and a lantern will burn on a night you cannot see.

dialogue.speaker: Aerin Rell
dialogue.line: Then I will pay what I can see. Keep your hooks out of our bones. I’ll warm your ledger with moonlight and show the names it hides.

rewards: Eel-skin ledger listing bribe disbursements tied to Danka Suth and ‘R. Mestri’.
Pilot’s knotpass from Iven Rill for free, lawful passage at Riverfoot Locks in emergencies.
A ghost-barge coin that warms near broken promises (one-time omen use).
